mapper.select: select id,createUser,createTime,updateUser,updateTime, username,name,job,phone,isSysAdmin,status from t_user where username=#{username} and password=#{password} and status='incumbent'

select t.id,t.createUser,t.createTime,t.updateUser,t.updateTime, t.username,t.name,t.job,t.phone, t.isSysAdmin, si.value isSysAdminValue, t.status, sc.value statusValue from t_user t left join t_sys_config si on si.code='isSysAdmin' and t.isSysAdmin=si.key left join t_sys_config sc on sc.code='userStatus' and t.status=sc.key where t.username=#{username}

select t.id,t.createUser,t.createTime,t.updateUser,t.updateTime, t.username,t.name,concat(t.name,'(',t.username,')') title, t.job,t.phone,t.isSysAdmin, si.value isSysAdminValue, t.status, sc.value statusValue from t_user t left join t_sys_config si on si.code='isSysAdmin' and t.isSysAdmin=si.key left join t_sys_config sc on sc.code='userStatus' and t.status=sc.key where 1=1
and t.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and t.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and t.job like concat('%',#{job},'%')
and t.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and t.isSysAdmin=#{isSysAdmin}
and t.status=#{status}
order by t.username
